items.title: Cooling demand warms up trouble for AC stocks, brokerages remain cautious
items.description: Voltas and Blue Star are likely to see a double-digit decline in Q1FY26 sales, as weak summer demand and excess inventory weigh heavily on the RAC sector, Jefferies warned

items.title: Sensex, Nifty likely to slip further as Israel-Iran conflict escalates; oil prices surge 4%
items.description: Oil prices surged over 4 percent as tensions between Iran and Israel escalated, even though key energy infrastructure and supply remained unaffected.

items.title: RailTel Corporation shares in focus on LoI worth Rs 44 crore
items.description: RailTel Corporation of India share price | The company board at their meeting held on June 15, 2025 has approved the recommendation of final dividend at the rate of 8.5% of paid-up share capital (Rs 0.85 per share) for the financial year 2024-25.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty opens below 24,800, Sensex down 200 pts; M&M, BSE, DLF, Bharat Forge  in focus
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:  ONGC, Trent, Asian Paints, TCS, Bajaj Finance were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers were Axis Bank, Tata Motors, JSW Steel, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Tata Consumer.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Urgo Capital, Delhivery, SML Isuzu, Hindustan Zinc, Bharat Forge, Polycab, RailTel Corporation in focus on 18 June
items.description: Stocks to watch, 18 June: Stocks like Delhivery, SML Isuzu, Hindustan Zinc, Polycab India, RailTel Corporation of India, Zydus Wellness, Vishal Mega Mart, GMR Airports, BSE, Alembic Pharmaceuticals, and Sammaan Capital will be in focus on June 18.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: After remaining net sellers for the last four days, the Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) turned buyers on June 17 as  they bought equities worth Rs 1,482 crore, while Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) continued their buying as they bought equities of Rs 8,207 crore on the same day.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade PB Fintech, Persistent Systems, Zensar Technologies, SBI Life Insurance, Supreme Industries, and others on June 18?
items.description: Market consolidation is expected to continue with the focus now shifting to the outcome of the US Federal Reserve meeting. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Vedanta to sell 1.6% stake in Hindustan Zinc in deal worth more than Rs 3,000 crore
items.description: The floor price for the deal has been fixed at Rs 452.5, a discount of nearly 7 percent to Tuesday's closing price of Rs 485.95 on NSE. The term sheet further added that a total of 66.7 million equity shares will be on offer.
